info.title: Unified Approvals Service
info.description:
Workfront Approvals public API endpoints are designed to help manage the document version approval process.
They allow users to view, add, update, and remove stages and participants involved in decision-making for various asset types.

### API Paths
- **Gateway URL**: `https://worfront.adobe.io`
- **Base Path**: `/unified-approvals`
- **Example Path**: `/public/api/v1/approvals/{assetType}/{assetId}`

### Required Headers
All calls require the following headers:

- `Authorization`: `Bearer {access_token}`
- `x-api-key`: Generated API key from Adobe Developer Console
- `x-gw-ims-org-id`: Generated IMS Org ID from Adobe Developer Console
- `x-gw-user-id`: User ID of the user making the request
- `x-gw-subdomain`: Customer subdomain

parameters.description: The id of the asset being approved
parameters.name: assetId
wf-userid
parameters.description: The WF user id of the user making the request

parameters.name: wf-customerid
parameters.description: The WF customer id of the user making the request

parameters.name: wf-lane
parameters.description: The lane for which the request is being made (ie devtest)

parameters.name: wf-subdomain
parameters.description: The customer's subdomain

parameters.name: x-product-id
parameters.description: This is the product name where the request is coming from

parameters.name: x-eauth-tenant-id
parameters.description: The auth tenant ID tied to the IMS Org ID where the request is coming from

get.summary: Get Approval details for an asset
get.description: Get Approval details for a particular asset by sending asset ID and asset type. Restricted to allowed public users

schema.description: The basic approval response object with all details
schema.title: Approval response

isLocked.description: Rollup of the stages isLocked field. If all stages are locked, this will be true, otherwise this will be false

put.summary: Allows to make a decision on an approval. For single stage approvals.
put.description: Make a decision on a stage. If the decision is already made, it will be updated. Overall stage and approval status will be updated based on the decision and other participants. Throws an error if the approval is not found or if participant is not allowed.

schema.description: The basic approval response object with all details
schema.title: Approval response

isLocked.description: Rollup of the stages isLocked field. If all stages are locked, this will be true, otherwise this will be false

parameters.name: assetId
x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: The IMS Org ID where the request is coming from

parameters.name: x-gw-user-id
parameters.description: The requesting user ID

schema.description: The basic approval response object with all details
schema.title: Approval response

isLocked.description: Rollup of the stages isLocked field. If all stages are locked, this will be true, otherwise this will be false

put.description: Adds or updates participants on the default stage on an approval. They can either be an approver or reviewer. Multiple participants can be added. Restricted to public users configured in Adobe I/O
put.summary: Allows to add participants to an approval on the default first stage

delete.summary: Allows to delete participants on an approval on the default first stage
delete.description: Allows to delete participants on an approval on the default first stage. They can either be an approver or reviewer. Multiple participants can be deleted. Restricted to allowed public users

isLocked.description: Rollup of the stages isLocked field. If all stages are locked, this will be true, otherwise this will be false

put.summary: Allows locking a particular stage in the approval
put.description: Locks the specified stage in the approval and sets the stage to inactive. We will get an error if we try to lock the stage without making decision first. Will throw an error if the approval or stage is not found. Restricted to allowed public users

schema.description: The basic approval response object with all details
schema.title: Approval response

isLocked.description: Rollup of the stages isLocked field. If all stages are locked, this will be true, otherwise this will be false

parameters.description: The requesting user ID

put.summary: Allows unlocking a particular stage in the approval
put.description: Unlocks the specified stage in the approval and sets the stage to active. We will get an error if we try to unlock the stage without making decision first. Will throw an error if the approval or stage is not found. Restricted to allowed public users

schema.description: The basic approval response object with all details
schema.title: Approval response
